OOC: And here I am! Let's transform and roll out, guys!

Bic: Dinobot turne=
d to Perseus, not very surprised of the wait, but
more by the presentation.=
 He hadn't expected Maximals to try for a
sneakier approach.

Dinobot: Fina=
lly! Well, Maximal, [grunt], some attention would
certainly be welcome. I a=
m Dinobot and I was sent out by Hydras to
reclaim someone named Trelos. I h=
ave given him my word and have
discovered many... details in my trip here.
=

Higher up, Doc slowly adjusted his aim on Dinobot's head.

Doc: You hear t=
hat, Rodimus? Should I hit him now?
